description: This file declares internal functions for the Web Authentication Server object, related to authentication requests, credential verification, and internal state management. It serves as a header file for internal API prototypes within the Web Authentication module.

methods.name: WebAuthsoVerifyCredential
methods.description: Verifies provided credentials for a session.

methods.name: WebAuthsoSetAcmIf
methods.description: Sets the interface for Access Control Management.

methods.name: WebAuthsoResetProperty
methods.description: Resets the internal properties of the Web Authentication Server.

methods.name: WebAuthsoGetProperty
methods.description: Retrieves the current property values of the Web Authentication Server.

methods.name: WebAuthsoSetProperty
methods.description: Sets new property values for the Web Authentication Server.
